text: Institut Sup'Biotech de Paris, commonly named Sup'Biotech, is a French private, non-profitMentions légales university establishment. It is in Villejuif (close to Paris), and in Lyon, France. The school was created in 2003.Sup’Biotech devient partenaire de l’École Pratique des Hautes Études (EPHE) Sup'Biotech specialises in Biotechnology.Sup'BiotechSup'Biotech signe un partenariat avec l'Institut de cancérologie Gustave Roussy The school is part of IONIS Education Group.Sup’Biotech == Bibliography == * Biotechnologies. Les promesses du vivant., Villejuif, FYP Éditions, 2015, 256 p. () * Planète biotech - 2030 : la vie avec les biotechnologies, Villejuif, FYP Éditions, 2023, 254 p. () ==References== Category:2003 establishments in Europe Category:Technical colleges and universities in France Category:2000s establishments in France
title: Institut Sup'Biotech de Paris
